document_data.caption: A map showing Overlooked Alley and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Overlooked Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Overlooked Alley''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Overlooked Alley was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] just west of [[Castle Waterdeep]]. The alley originated on [[Watchmen's Way]], branching east then turning north to end on [[Soldier's Street]].
